TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit OperationDescription extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示协定操作的说明，该协定操作可提供组成操作的消息的说明。

span.span: Represents the description of a contract operation that provides a description of the messages that make up the operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 协定是指定与外界通信的终结点的操作集合。A Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) contract is a collection of operations that specifies what the endpoint communicates to the outside world. 每个操作都是一次消息交换。Each operation is a message exchange. 例如，构成请求/回复消息交换的请求消息以及与该请求消息关联的回复消息。For example, a request message and an associated reply message forming a request/reply message exchange. 对象用于描述协定及其操作。A object is used to describe contracts and their operations. 在 内，每个协定操作都具有相应的 ，它会对操作的各个方面进行描述，例如操作是单向的还是请求/回复。Within a , each contract operation has a corresponding that describes aspects of the operation, such as whether the operation is one-way or request/reply. 每个还介绍了对组成该操作使用的集合的消息对象。Each also describes the messages that make up the operation using a collection of objects. 包含有可利用编程模型定义协定的接口的引用。 contains a reference to an interface that defines the contract using the programming model. 此接口带有 标记，该接口的与终结点操作相对应的方法带有 标记。This interface is marked with , and its methods that correspond to endpoint operations are marked with . 上的属性的许多对 WCF 编程模型中的相应属性，例如， 。Many of the properties on have corresponding properties in the WCF programming model on , for example, . ## Examples 下面的示例使用从返回的集合返回属性类。The following example uses the returned from the collection returned by the property of the class. 该代码循环访问终结点集合，并输出每个终结点的名称以及终结点中的每个操作的名称。The code iterates through the collection of endpoints and prints each endpoint name, as well as the name of each operation in the endpoint. [!code-csharp[DataContractSerializerOperationBehavior#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/datacontractserializeroperationbehavior/cs/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[DataContractSerializerOperationBehavior#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/datacontractserializeroperationbehavior/vb/source.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实现 接口是为了在应用程序级别，修改、检查或扩展客户端或服务应用程序的操作范围内的某个执行方面。The interface is implemented to modify, examine, or extend some aspect of operation-wide execution at the application level for either client or service applications.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property HasProtectionLevel As Boolean
public: property bool HasProtectionLevel { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取指示操作是否已设置保护级别的值。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the operation has had a protection level set.

value.span: 如果已经设置了保护级别，则为 ，否则为 。

span.span: if the protection level has been set; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果设置了 ，则 属性设置为 `true`。When the is set, the property is set to `true`. 对应于Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 编程模型中的属性。 corresponds to the property in the Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) programming model. 使用 属性可以指示操作的消息所要求的特定保护级别。Use the property to indicate that a specific protection level is required by the messages of this operation.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IsInitiating { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.IsInitiating : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示方法是否实现可在服务器上启动会话（如果存在会话）的操作。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the method implements an operation that can initiate a session on the server (if such a session exists).

value.span: 如果允许操作启动服务器上的会话，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the operation is permitted to initiate a session on the server, otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性控制操作是否可以是创建会话时调用的第一个操作。The property controls whether an operation can be the first operation called when a session is created. > [!NOTE] > 的值必须为 `true`，并且所使用的绑定必须支持 属性的会话，以使其能正常工作。The value of must be `true` and the binding used must support sessions for the property to work properly. 默认为 `true`，这意味着操作可以是通道上调用的第一个操作。The default is `true`, which means that an operation can be the first one called on a channel. 除了调用该方法之外，后续的调用对于启动方法无效。Subsequent calls to the initiating method have no effect, other than to call the method. 不会创建其他任何会话。No other sessions are created. 通常，将 设置为 `false` 可强制客户端在调用此方法之前，调用服务上的另一个方法。Typically, you set to `false` to force clients to call another method on the service before they can invoke this one. 对应于Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 编程模型中的属性。 corresponds to the property in the Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) programming model.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsOneWay As Boolean
public: property bool IsOneWay { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示操作是否返回答复消息。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether an operation returns a reply message.

value.span: 如果此方法收到请求消息，但未返回任何答复消息，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if this method receives a request message and returns no reply message; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性指示操作不返回答复消息。Use the property to indicate that an operation does not return a reply message. 这种类型的操作对通知或事件样式通信十分有用，特别是双向通信。This type of operation is useful for notifications or event-style communication, especially in two-way communication. 如果 属性设置为 `false`（默认值），即使返回 `void` 的方法也会生成答复消息。If the property is set to `false` (the default), even methods that return `void` result in a reply message. 在此种情况下，基础结构将创建并发送一条空消息，以向调用方指示该方法已返回内容。In this case, the infrastructure creates and sends an empty message to indicate to the caller that the method has returned. 对应于Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 编程模型中的属性。 corresponds to the property in the Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) programming model.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IsTerminating { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.IsTerminating : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示服务操作在发送答复消息（如果存在）后，是否会导致服务器关闭会话。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the service operation causes the server to close the session after the reply message, if any, is sent.

value.span: 如果该操作会导致服务器关闭会话，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the operation causes the server to close the session, otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性指示调用服务操作可终止通信会话。Use the property to indicate that calling a service operation terminates the communication session. 对应于Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 编程模型中的属性。 corresponds to the property in the Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) programming model.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property KnownTypes As Collection(Of Type)

summary.span: 获取与操作说明关联的已知类型。

span.span: Gets the known types associated with the operation description.

value.span: 与操作说明关联的已知类型的集合。

span.span: The collection of known types associated with the operation description.

remarks.format: ## Remarks *已知类型*是指发生序列化或反序列化时可在对象图中呈现的类型。The *known types* are types which may be present in an object graph when serialization or deserialization occurs. 有关已知类型的详细信息，请参阅[数据协定已知类型](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/data-contract-known-types.md)。For more information about known types, see [Data Contract Known Types](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/data-contract-known-types.md).

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Name As String
public: property System::String ^ Name { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取或设置操作说明的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the operation description.
The name of the operation description.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性重写 <`operation`> WSDL 中的元素名称。The property overrides the <`operation`> element name in WSDL. 默认的操作名称为实现方法的名称。The default operation name is the name of the implementing method.

summary.span: 获取或设置操作的保护级别。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性可控制是否必须对操作消息进行加密或签名，或两者都必须进行。The property controls whether the messages of an operation must be encrypted, signed, or both. 除非较窄范围重写此处设置的值，否则此值是为此操作指定的所有消息的默认值。The value set here is the default value for all messages specified for this operation unless a narrower scope overrides this value. 对应于Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 编程模型中的属性。 corresponds to the property in the Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) programming model. 如果设置了 ，则 属性设置为 `true`。When the is set, the property is set to `true`.
